name: Daytona.io Dev Container
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y python3 python3-pip python3-venv && cd /workspace/backend && python3 -m venv venv && ./venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt && cd /workspace/frontend && npm install
postStartCommand: if docker ps -a --filter name=meilisearch --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -w meilisearch; then docker start meilisearch || true; else docker run -d --name meilisearch -p 7700:7700 getmeili/meilisearch:v1.2; fi && /workspace/backend/venv/bin/uvicorn backend.app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 & npm run dev --prefix /workspace/frontend
